Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.name: executor
Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.abstract: The block to be asynchronously executed that will resolve or reject the promise.

Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.name: resultObservers
Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.abstract: The Resolved blocks to be called when the promise is resolved.

Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.name: errorObservers
Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.abstract: The Rejected blocks to be called when the promise is rejected.

Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.name: result
Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.abstract: The result of the promise in case it has been resolved.

Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.name: error
Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.abstract: The error of the promise in case it has been rejected.

Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.name: -then:
Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.abstract: Calls the provided Resolved block with the result of the promise if it is resolved.

Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.name: -catch:
Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.abstract: Calls the provided Rejected block with an error caused by a rejection of the promise.

Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.name: +all:
Classes/Promise.html#/c:objc(cs)Promise(.abstract: Helper method that executes multiple promises in parallel and returns a Promise that is resolved when all the provided promises have finished executing.
